name: ENRAGED (Branton Lansdale)
description:
ENRAGED is a turn based rogue-like made for a game jam, featuring:

-Turn based combat system -

-Leveling system-

-Random loot system -

-Inventory system-

-Explore the forest in 8 different combat areas-

-Perma-death-

If I continue this project, I intend to:

Flesh out combat system, adding different attack types (Element based). Damage over time attacks, more enemies (LOTS MORE), boss fights, more items to loot, unique areas, more player character class options.
